rekit.gui.controller.commands.Command

Description
rekit.gui.controller.commands
 

  • Uses of Command in rekit.gui.controller.commands

    Classes in rekit.gui.controller.commands that implement Command
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    AttackCommand
    This Command will pass the users attack indicator into the current IScene.
    class 
    EntityCommand
    This class defines an Command which will be executed by a Controller and is linked to an Entity.
    final class 
    FilterCommand
    This Command Type is used for attaching and/or detaching Filters to a View.
    class 
    JumpCommand
    This EntityCommand will cause a Jump of an Entity.
    class 
    MenuCommand
    This class is used for the MenuGameState.
    class 
    PlayPauseCommand
    This class will be used while ingame to toggle pause.
    class 
    WalkCommand
    This EntityCommand will cause a Walk of an Entity.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StateEntity
    CommandSupervisor.getEntity(Command command)
    Get the entity the Command is assigned to.
    MenuItem
    CommandSupervisor.getMenu(Command command)
